item.title: Ship Oâ€™hoi
item.description: An interactive ship controller, when people’s hand get close to the controller (don’t have to touch), the graph which is related to the controller will pop out to help the boat driver get the information easier. Backround Research this is one project of tangible interaction class, the theme which we choose is ship controller Field Observation After visiting the USN (an university in Norway which aims to educate the captain and has the Simulated bridge), Lilaas(an company designs and produces the boat controller ), and talking with the real captain, we find that there are so many controllers on the boat and different controllers are related to different graph on the screen, besides that, there are also many screen on the boat.

item.title: Elvelangs-Hug
item.description: An interactive device cooperating with Stiftelsen Organdonasjon to help more people know dead organ donation. Topic Source This project is one of our tangible interaction project and we cooperate with a organ donation organization of Oslo named Stiftelsen Organdonasjon, theme to introduce the idea of dead organ donation to more people. And this Interactive device finally showed in the light show called Elvelangs and attracted a lot of people. One For Seven After their introduction, we thinked various of ideas.
